The widening will increase until there is a breach made between those who accept these views and those who believe the third's angel's message. 


                                     -357- 

Just as soon as these ideas are accepted, then there will be a drawing away from those whom God has used in this work, for the mind begins to doubt and withdraw from the leaders because God has laid them aside and chosen more humble men to do His work. This is the only interpretation they can give to this matter, as the leaders do not see this important light.
